name: Pyro Hypostasis
desc:
Code Name: Ayin. A high-purity Pyro entity.
According to researchers, Elemental Hypostases are related to anomalies in local Elemental veins. But whether it is the existence of Elemental Hypostases that have affected Elemental veins or the mutated Elemental Energy that created Elemental Hypostases remains to be confirmed.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Smoldering Pearl
dropMaterial.desc:
A crystallization of a Pyro Hypostasis that constantly emits heat.
Even the burning flames shall one day grow cold, and even the ashen firewood can will itself back into a raging blaze. It must then be the will of the world that Pyro Hypostases should constantly cool down and heat up, much like the universe teems with endless life... until the fated darkness shall one day descend and bring it all to naught.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

customize.text: Protects itself with a cubical shell that is elementally inert. Has two states: Ignited and Extinguished. In the Ignited state, the Pyro Hypostasis's core is not exposed and it continuously regenerates HP. Only after <color=#ffe14b>Extinguishing it with the right elemental reactions</color> will you have an opportunity to strike. In the Extinguished state, the Pyro Hypostasis will generate Fire Seeds in an attempt to re-ignite.

<color=#ffd780>Burned Yourself, Did You?</color>
Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis that has reignited twice.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Smells like Animal Spirit!</color>
Defeat a Pyro Hypostasis after being hit by its mimetic 3-hit combo.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>It's Quiet... Too Quiet...</color>
Defeat the Pyro Hypostasis after it enters its extinguished state only once

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
